title: primlogix
description: PRIM Logix’s Software is specifically designed for the staffing and recruiting agencies that have the appetite to grow and stay strong.  Our technology is based on a strong expertise in both IT environments, including Web, cloud hosting, mobility, recruiting processes as well as industry know-how. The ergonomics and features are updated and developed with user’s feedback in mind. In a nutshell, the focus is on staffing and recruiting. Is it a specialized system? You bet It is!
